itemListElement.name: 40oz. Stainless Steel Insulated Tumbler by Ashland®

name: 40oz. Stainless Steel Insulated Tumbler by Ashland®
description: Enjoy your favorite hot or cold beverage in this stainless steel tumbler. Perfect for personal use or to give as a gift, this large capacity tumbler has a convenient handle so you can take your drink on the go. Add personalized touches to your tumbler by using vinyl to make it one of a kind!Details:Available in multiple colors40 fl. oz. (1.18 L)Wash prior to first useLid is top rack dishwasher safeHand wash stainless steel vesselDo not use any abrasivesStraw or sip lidLeak proofFits in cup holdersBPA freeStainless steel, plastic and siliconeWARNING: Do not use in microwave or convection oven. Do not place in freezer. Keep out of reach of children when tumbler has hot liquid inside. Do not use straw for hot beverages.

review.author: samantha
review.name: samantha
review.reviewBody: Ordered 7 of the tumblers. When the order arrived all items were damaged. None of the tumblers were wrapped and just seemed to be thrown into the box. There were no straws and one cup was missing the handle. Tried to contact customer service and was told that they would reship the items but the original ones had to be returned to a store first. If I have to take them back to a store and can't ship them why not just exchange them there for ones I know will not be damaged. Worst order received from Michaels.

review.author: Marlene
review.name: Marlene
review.reviewBody: Love this cup! Scored it for $10 - can't beat that!  It goes everywhere with me and is my signature color (hot pink!) Very strong and sturdy with a tight-fitting lid to prevent spills. So much yes!

review.author: Hannah
review.name: Hannah
review.reviewBody: It was sturdy and cheap (I got it for $10). I wouldn’t pay $20 (full price) for it but at $10 I definitely will!

review.author: David
review.name: David
review.reviewBody: This is a beautiful cup. However, it does not insulate well at all, and any ice inside caused significant condensation on the outside of the cup, even when it was inside of a room.  Again, the color is so pretty… but the cup is super disappointing.  Would not recommend.

review.author: Denise
review.name: Denise
review.reviewBody: nice looking but does not keep drinks cold…. not even for minutes.

review.author: Annie
review.name: Annie
review.reviewBody: Love my cup keeps my drinks nice and cold and so much cheaper than the other one

review.author: Kirk
review.name: Kirk
review.reviewBody: Okay tumbler at the sale price $9.99. Good build quality and okay coverage with coating for the price. The handle does remove if you are needing that.  The issue is with Michael's and how they shipped these to me. I ordered 11 tumblers and I will return all.  3 tumblers came in one box, it had some paper wrapped up and in the box but none of the tumblers were wrapped in anything. Second box had 8 tumblers shoved into it with no packing material and none of the tumblers wrapped.  Of course, the items all move while being shipped, they are scratched, dented and chipped. The contents also were covered in dust from riding in the UPS truck because the box was sealed with the minimum amount of tape. I honestly can't believe the box didn't bust open because the tumblers do have some heft to them.   I will leave a review based on the quality of tumbler but recommend only getting these from the store. Very disappointed with Michael's and their shipping and will have to look elsewhere next time if not in store.

review.author: Barbara
review.name: Barbara
review.reviewBody: The colors chipped off during shipping. I returned all of the colors I ordered because every cup had chips of paint that came off. Didn’t want to give these as gifts because of the potential of more paint coming off.

review.author: Angela
review.name: Angela
review.reviewBody: i didnt get my draw to my cup

itemReviewed.name: 40oz Stainless Steel Insulated Tumbler by Ashland

data.shortDescription: 40oz. Stainless Steel Insulated Tumbler by Ashland®
data.mediumDescription: 40oz. Stainless Steel Insulated Tumbler by Ashland® | Michaels
data.longDescription:
Enjoy your favorite hot or cold beverage in this stainless steel tumbler. Perfect for personal use or to give as a gift, this large capacity tumbler has a convenient handle so you can take your drink on the go. Add personalized touches to your tumbler by using vinyl to make it one of a kind!

Details:
  • Available in multiple colors
  • 40 fl. oz. (1.18 L)
  • Wash prior to first use
  • Lid is top rack dishwasher safe
  • Hand wash stainless steel vessel
  • Do not use any abrasives
  • Straw or sip lid
  • Leak proof
  • Fits in cup holders
  • BPA free
  • Stainless steel, plastic and silicone

WARNING: Do not use in microwave or convection oven. Do not place in freezer. Keep out of reach of children when tumbler has hot liquid inside. Do not use straw for hot beverages.

reviews.author: samantha
reviews.name: samantha
reviews.reviewBody: Ordered 7 of the tumblers. When the order arrived all items were damaged. None of the tumblers were wrapped and just seemed to be thrown into the box. There were no straws and one cup was missing the handle. Tried to contact customer service and was told that they would reship the items but the original ones had to be returned to a store first. If I have to take them back to a store and can't ship them why not just exchange them there for ones I know will not be damaged. Worst order received from Michaels.

reviews.author: Marlene
reviews.name: Marlene
reviews.reviewBody: Love this cup! Scored it for $10 - can't beat that!  It goes everywhere with me and is my signature color (hot pink!) Very strong and sturdy with a tight-fitting lid to prevent spills. So much yes!

reviews.author: Hannah
reviews.name: Hannah
reviews.reviewBody: It was sturdy and cheap (I got it for $10). I wouldn’t pay $20 (full price) for it but at $10 I definitely will!

reviews.author: David
reviews.name: David
reviews.reviewBody: This is a beautiful cup. However, it does not insulate well at all, and any ice inside caused significant condensation on the outside of the cup, even when it was inside of a room.  Again, the color is so pretty… but the cup is super disappointing.  Would not recommend.

reviews.author: Denise
reviews.name: Denise
reviews.reviewBody: nice looking but does not keep drinks cold…. not even for minutes.

reviews.author: Annie
reviews.name: Annie
reviews.reviewBody: Love my cup keeps my drinks nice and cold and so much cheaper than the other one

reviews.author: Kirk
reviews.name: Kirk
reviews.reviewBody: Okay tumbler at the sale price $9.99. Good build quality and okay coverage with coating for the price. The handle does remove if you are needing that.  The issue is with Michael's and how they shipped these to me. I ordered 11 tumblers and I will return all.  3 tumblers came in one box, it had some paper wrapped up and in the box but none of the tumblers were wrapped in anything. Second box had 8 tumblers shoved into it with no packing material and none of the tumblers wrapped.  Of course, the items all move while being shipped, they are scratched, dented and chipped. The contents also were covered in dust from riding in the UPS truck because the box was sealed with the minimum amount of tape. I honestly can't believe the box didn't bust open because the tumblers do have some heft to them.   I will leave a review based on the quality of tumbler but recommend only getting these from the store. Very disappointed with Michael's and their shipping and will have to look elsewhere next time if not in store.

reviews.author: Barbara
reviews.name: Barbara
reviews.reviewBody: The colors chipped off during shipping. I returned all of the colors I ordered because every cup had chips of paint that came off. Didn’t want to give these as gifts because of the potential of more paint coming off.

reviews.author: Angela
reviews.name: Angela
reviews.reviewBody: i didnt get my draw to my cup
